00020 JournalStack::JournalStack(QWidget *parent, const char *name)
00021     : QWidget(parent,name)
00022 {
00023     db = Database::instance();
00024     printer = Printer::instance();
00025     settings = Settings::instance();
00026 
00027     exportPath = settings->getExportPath();
00028     importPath = settings->getImportPath();
00029     
00030     active = false;
00031     printed = false;
00032 }

00037 void JournalStack::dbOpened()
00038 {
00039     if(active)
00040     {
00041         delete main.exportButton;
00042         delete main.importButton;
00043         delete main.bottomRightBoxLayout;
00044         delete main.bottomRightFrame;
00045         delete main.bottomLabel;
00046         delete main.bottomHBoxLayout;

00048         delete main.hr;
00049         delete main.summary;
00050         delete main.dataTable;
00051         delete main.saveAndClear;
00052         delete main.print;
00053         delete main.topLabel;
00054         delete main.labelLayout;
00055         delete main.vBoxLayout;
00056     }
00057     
00058     main.vBoxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00059     main.vBoxLayout->setMargin(5);
00060     
00061     main.labelLayout = new QBoxLayout(main.vBoxLayout, QBoxLayout::LeftToRight);
00062     
00063     main.topLabel = new GoBackLabel(this);
00064     connect(main.topLabel, SIGNAL(goBack()), this, SIGNAL(goToMain()));
00065     
00066     main.saveAndClear = new QPushButton(
00067             QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/saveAndClear.png") ),
00068             "Save and Clear (F8)", this);
00069     main.saveAndClear->setFocusPolicy(QWidget::NoFocus);
00070     connect(main.saveAndClear, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(saveAndClear()));
00071     
00072     main.print = new QPushButton(
00073             QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/print.png") ),
00074             "Print Journal Entries (F9)", this);
00075     main.print->setFocusPolicy(QWidget::NoFocus);
00076     connect(main.print, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(printJournal()));
00077     
00078     main.labelLayout->addWidget(main.topLabel, 0, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00079     main.labelLayout->addStretch();
00080     main.labelLayout->addWidget(main.saveAndClear);
00081     main.labelLayout->addSpacing(5);
00082     main.labelLayout->addWidget(main.print);
00083     
00084     main.dataTable = new JournalTable(this);
00085     connect(main.dataTable, SIGNAL(goToMain()), this, SIGNAL(goToMain()));
00086     connect(main.dataTable, SIGNAL(goToAccounts()), this, SIGNAL(goToAccounts()));
00087     connect(main.dataTable, SIGNAL(goToReports()), this, SIGNAL(goToReports()));
00088     connect(main.dataTable, SIGNAL(goToHelp()), this, SIGNAL(goToHelp()));
00089     main.dataTable->installEventFilter(this);
00090     
00091     main.vBoxLayout->addSpacing(5);
00092     main.vBoxLayout->addWidget(main.dataTable);
00093     
00094     main.summary = new JournalSummary(this, 0, main.dataTable);
00095     main.vBoxLayout->addWidget(main.summary);
00096

00104     main.bottomLabel = new QLabel(
00105             "<nobr><b>Keyboard Control:</b></nobr><br>"
00106             "<nobr> &nbsp; &nbsp; <b>Enter</b>: Edit current field, move to next field</nobr><br>"

00138 void JournalStack::importCSV()
00139 {
00140     QString file = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(
00141             importPath,
00142             "Comma Separated Values (*.csv)",
00143             this,
00144             0,
00145             "Import Journal Entries");
00146     
00147     if(file != "")
00148     {
00149         db->importCSV("journalTmp", file);
00150         main.dataTable->populate();
00151     }
00152 }
00153 
00154 void JournalStack::exportCSV()
00155 {
00156     if(db->journalTmpEmpty())
00157         return;
00158 
00159     QString file = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(
00160             exportPath,
00161             "Comma Separated Values (*.csv)",
00162             this,
00163             0,
00164             "Export Journal Entries");
00165 
00166     if(file != "")
00167         db->exportCSV("journalTmp", file);
00168 }
00169 
00170 bool JournalStack::eventFilter(QObject *target, QEvent *event)
00171 {
00172     if(event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress)
00173     {
00174         QKeyEvent *keyEvent = (QKeyEvent*)event;
00175         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F8)
00176         {
00177             saveAndClear();
00178             return true;
00179         }
00180         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F9)
00181         {
00182             printJournal();
00183             return true;
00184         }
00185         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F11)
00186         {
00187             importCSV();
00188             return true;
00189         }
00190         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F12)
00191         {
00192             exportCSV();
00193             return true;
00194         }
00195     }
00196     
00197     return QWidget::eventFilter(target,event);
00198 }
00199 
00200 void JournalStack::saveAndClear()
00201 {
00202     if(db->journalTmpEmpty())
00203         return;
00204 
00205     if(!printed)
00206     {
00207         QDialog dialog;
00208         dialog.setCaption("Print Before Closing");
00209 
00210         QVBoxLayout vBoxLayout(&dialog);
00211         vBoxLayout.setMargin(5);
00212         vBoxLayout.setSpacing(5);
00213 
00214         QLabel label("<nobr>You have not printed the Journal Entries.</nobr><br>"
00215                 "<nobr>Would you like to print them now?</nobr>", &dialog);
00216         vBoxLayout.addWidget(&label);
00217 
00218         vBoxLayout.addSpacing(10);
00219 
00220         QHBoxLayout hBoxLayout(&vBoxLayout);
00221         hBoxLayout.setSpacing(5);
00222 
00223         QPushButton noPrintButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/saveAndClear.png")),
00224                                   "Save Without Printing", &dialog);
00225         connect(&noPrintButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(reject()));
00226         noPrintButton.setDefault(false);
00227 
00228         QPushButton printButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/print.png")),
00229                                 "Print and Save", &dialog);
00230         connect(&printButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(accept()));
00231         printButton.setDefault(true);
00232 
00233         hBoxLayout.addStretch();
00234         hBoxLayout.addWidget(&noPrintButton);
00235         hBoxLayout.addWidget(&printButton);
00236 
00237         if(dialog.exec())
00238             printJournal();
00239 
00240     }
00241     db->commitJournalTmp();
00242     main.dataTable->clearTable();
00243 }
00244 
00245 void JournalStack::printJournal()
00246 {
00247     if(db->journalTmpEmpty())
00248         return;
00249 
00250     db->getJournalTmpReport();
00251     printer->printReport(db->journalTmpReportHeader(), db->journalTmpReportData());
00252 }
00253 
00254 void JournalStack::showEvent(QShowEvent*)
00255 {
00256     main.dataTable->setFocus();
00257 }
